title: Senior Accountant, General Ledger
content:
Who We Are
In 2021, Poatek was acquired by WillowTree, an award-winning digital product consultancy recognized as one of the fastest growing and best places to work in the United States. Now a TELUS International company, with offices across the globe, we continue to partner with the world’s leading brands, such as Fox, Capital One, HBO, PepsiCo, Domino’s and more, to design, build, and transform their digital products and strategies. We’re looking to grow our Poatek offices in Brazil with top talent excited to collaborate with team members across the globe to deliver innovative solutions for our clients.
Location and Flexibility
This role requires the ability to work in a hybrid mode from one of our offices in São Paulo or Porto Alegre, in office throughout the week based on team needs, while still providing the flexibility to work remotely on other days. Our hybrid culture is designed to foster in-person innovation, collaboration, and connection with team members local and visiting from other global offices.
The Opportunity
The Senior Accountant, General Ledger is an autonomous role with the opportunity to impact our teams through your attention to detail and meticulous execution. Using your knowledge of journal entries and chart of accounts, you’ll take ownership and leadership of our ledger. You’ll leverage your accounting expertise to drive change and improvement in the organization in order to cement our place as one of the top digital product consultancies in the world. This position will be based in Brazil and report to United States teams.
Responsibilities

Ownership and guidance of our general ledger, including fixed asset management (US scope) 
Collaboratively partner with fellow accounting partners to prepare journal entry allocations and subledger entries
A key contributor to our annual audit preparation
Perform and review monthly account reconciliations by investigating unreconciled balances or variances between our general ledger and source documents
Consistently involved in raising ideas and solutions for process improvements and documentation practices
Ensure SOX compliance by adhering to internal controls and requirements
Maintaining accurate and updated documentation while providing recommendations for appropriate preparation, analysis, and interpretation of financial results

Qualifications

4+ years of professional accounting experience
Expertise with General Ledger accounting and maintenance, including deferred and accrued accounts
Expertise/knowledge of general ledger software and Microsoft Excel
Displays high levels of partnership in team environments
Proven track record of collaborating with clients and/or cross-disciplinary stakeholders effectively
Understanding of GAAP and/or IFRS, keeping up with trends, changes, and knowledge of accounting best practices
Familiarity with financial audits or reviews
Experience working with US accounting requirements and standards
Fluent English

Bonus Points

Experience with Financial Force and Workday
Expertise creating ad-hoc reports
Experience with the preparation of monthly financial statements
Experience with cash flow analysis
Experience with intercompany accounting 
Degree in Accounting/Finance or CPA

Why WillowTree/ Poatek?
In addition to being part of an international and innovative consultancy company, you will have:

Flexible hours and autonomy
Work with cutting edge technologies
Partner with global and relevant brands in the market
Collaborative team and learning ecosystem
Career development plan & growth
International travel opportunities (optional)

Some of our benefits:

Health and dental plan
Life insurance
Monthly vouchers for meals, culture, education, health and mobility
Child Care assistance
And more!
